pre-battle-txt: My name is Yzebel a Rich Citizen of Utica
Or at last I use to be that, but 6 month ago
Romans Take our City, I was then toke as a salve
On a night we was stationed at near the beach
After his watch, like every night
decide to plante his dager in me
But thisnight, I decide his dagger was better plant in his own belly
I then take his bellonging, wear itm go out of his tent
2 Roman was here, and not very happy to see Romulus Body fluid on me
